settings.title: Epic Comfort and Durability
settings.text:
Discover the ultimate blend of comfort and style with the Mtns Co {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} Hoodie, featuring the authentic {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} Resort logo. Designed for adventurers and outdoor enthusiasts, this hoodie is a great winter layer, while on the mountain or during some après-ski relaxation. Made with a soft 65% ring-spun cotton and 35% polyester blend, it’s as durable as it is comfortable. The front pouch pocket adds practicality, while the self-fabric patch on the back and matching flat drawstrings elevate its rugged, yet refined look. The hoodie features a three-panel hood for extra warmth and style.

Please note: this hoodie runs small, so we recommend ordering a size up for the ideal fit.
